name: Form & Register Your Business
description:
Once you have confirmed your prospective location, itâ€™s time to officially register your business with the State. 
In this step you are identifying and registering your desired business names, creating your legal entity, and then registering for New Jersey State taxes.

tasks.name: Search for Available Business Names
tasks.description: Before registering your business at the Federal & State level, confirm that both your desired legal name and (if different) consumer facing name are available in New Jersey.

tasks.name: Register for an EIN
tasks.description: An Employer Identification Number is essentially your Social Security Number for your business. If you plan on having employees you will need an EIN number, however we recommend that most businesses obtain an EIN, so that you don't need to use your personal personal SSN on tax filings and other business registrations.

tasks.name: Form your Business Entity
tasks.description: Form the legal structure that you will operate under, and register that structure and name with the state of New Jersey.

tasks.name: Register Your Alternate Name
tasks.description: Since you want to create a name different from your legal name, you'll need to register an Alternate Name with the division of Revenue.

tasks.name: Register for Tax Purposes with DORES
tasks.description: It's time to register your business for State Taxes. Doing so will tell the state more about your business and determine what taxes your liable for.
